basics.name: Sanghun Shin
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate in the Technology Management, Economics and Policy Program (TEMEP) at Seoul National University. Research interests in applied artificial intelligence, social simulation, and computational modeling of complex societal dynamics.

education.area: Ph.D. Candidate, Technology Management, Economics and Policy Program (TEMEP)

publications.name: Modeling User Behavioural Intention and Usage Behaviour for Wearable Robots: A UTAUT2-Integrated SEM and ANN Approach
publications.publisher: Universal Access in the Information Society
publications.summary: Analyzed key factors influencing user behavioural intention and usage behaviour for wearable robot technology using a UTAUT2-integrated PLS-SEM and ANN framework applied to survey data from 200 adults.
